thread.title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited – Orsinium DLC detailed
thread.title_full: The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited – Orsinium DLC detailed

author: News Zombie
title: The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited – Orsinium DLC detailed
text:
Posted on October 5, 2015 in DLC , PC News , PlayStation 4 News 
Bethesda has detailed and previewed the latest downloadable pack for The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited, Orsinium. The add-on will expand the realm with two public dungeons for solo and group play (Old Orsinium, Rkindaleft), a nine-ring arena challenge with two difficulty levels (The Maelstrom Arena), and the Orcs’ ancestral home, Orsinium, in the Wrothgar Mountains. New gear, unique crafting skills, and quests are also being added, all of which is estimated to add over 20 hours of play time. PC gamers are getting a chance to play the Orsinium later today when it goes up for testing on the Public Test Server. 
For more information about the game, check out our review of The Elder Scrolls Online for PC . 
The Elder Scrolls Online: Tamriel Unlimited – Orsinium is scheduled to go live for Mac and PC on November 17 and for PS4 and Xbox One on November 18. ESO Plus Members will get it free, while non-members will be able to purchase it for 3,000 crowns in the Crown Store. 
–
